GoodieHutType.Name: Crustacean Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Crustaceans rarely stay in one place for long, but on occasion their camps can be found in forest areas.

GoodieHutType.Name: Cave
GoodieHutType.Description: A huge pile of boulders blocks the winding mountain path... though beyond the rocks, you can see the entrance to a cavern.

GoodieHutType.Name: Demonshrill Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: These rocks are home to a pack of Demonshrill, half-shrill who sometimes nest near crystal crags.

Treasure.Title: Demonshrill Lair
Treasure.Desc: You have discovered a Demonshrill Lair! Build an improvement on this resource to gain Demonshrill units.

GoodieHutType.Name: Venusian Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: This place is a favored camp by the nomadic Venusian warriors.

Treasure.Desc: Animal bones litter the Venusian camp but there is little of value. After a careful search you find a single item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Landslide!
GoodieHutType.Description: A huge pile of boulders blocks the winding mountain path... though beyond the rocks, you can see the entrance to a cavern.

Treasure.Title: Dragon Lair
Treasure.Desc: These crags, the spines of the earth, are home to ancient creatures. The air echoes with their voices and the land resonates with the power of massive scaled claws on stone. Dragon will return to this place, as they have for centuries, if you build a camp here you may be able to recruit them to your cause.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wolfman Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: These rocks are home to a pack of Wolfmen.

Treasure.Title: Wolfman Lair
Treasure.Desc: You have discovered a Wolfman lair! If you build a camp here you will be able to recruit them to your cause.
